snippet: The Pentagon confirmed a new wave of strikes on Friday in Yemen against al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula but a spokesman denied reports that American forces had been engaged in ground combat or conducting raids....

headline.main: The Latest: Reporter Says Bomb Threat Suspect Harassed Him
headline.print_headline: The Latest: Reporter Says Bomb Threat Suspect Harassed Him

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon confirmed a new wave of strikes on Friday in Yemen against al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula but a spokesman denied reports that American forces had been engaged in ground combat or conducting raids.
